info.author: kulprit.001
info.description:
This just basically a skeleton for working with elements.
Handy for working stuff out, if you already know what your doing. 
Still have heaps of functions and values to add, but i thought some people might enjoy tinkering with this themselves and maybe take it in their own direction.
Usage:(this creates an atom object.(capital A() tacked onto any element name))
>>>x=hA()
(This gets it's electronic configuration)
>>>e(x)
(Elements can be used in basic math like this.(elements start with Capitals))
>>>H+He
(Or any molecules mass like this)
>>>molecule()


But most of the real fun is in changing the code, so i'll let you get to it.
Hope this was useful. 

Good luck.
info.name: Atomix
